mapper.select:
SELECT v.video_id, v.channel_id, v.title, v.thumbnail_url, v.published_at, c.channel_name AS channel_title, c.thumbnail_url AS channel_thumbnail_url FROM channel_videos v JOIN youtube_channels c ON v.channel_id = c.channel_id
AND v.title ILIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'
AND v.channel_id = #{channelId}
AND (v.title NOT ILIKE '%#shorts%' AND v.description NOT ILIKE '%#shorts%')
